meanings.definition: The quality or state of being voluminous.
meanings.sent1: Her dress's voluminousnesses made it stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The voluminousnesses of the clouds indicated an impending storm.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to hide in the voluminousnesses of the curtains was comical.
meanings.sent4: The voluminousnesses of her laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The voluminousnesses of the library overwhelmed the bookworm with delight.

meanings.definition: The extent or size of something in terms of volume.
meanings.sent1: The voluminousnesses of the box surprised me when I opened it.
meanings.sent2: The scientist measured the voluminousnesses of the liquid in the beaker.
meanings.sent3: The voluminousnesses of the cake made it impossible to finish in one sitting.
meanings.sent4: The voluminousnesses of the ocean depths are still largely unexplored.
meanings.sent5: The voluminousnesses of the storage unit amazed the new tenant.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being large in volume or quantity.
meanings.sent1: The company's success was evident in the voluminousnesses of their sales records.
meanings.sent2: The voluminousnesses of the warehouse impressed the visitors.
meanings.sent3: The voluminousnesses of the buffet left everyone feeling stuffed.
meanings.sent4: The voluminousnesses of her hair added to her striking appearance.
meanings.sent5: The voluminousnesses of the forest seemed endless to the hikers.
